messages: Someone passing by is eyeing quality {0} goods, but they don’t have enough money.
Police chasing a pickpocket!
A dog runs by with a wallet in its mouth.
A couple is arguing about money.
Cosplayers are running around, pretending to be characters from a popular movie.
A group of tourists is taking pictures of the store.
A mime is silently performing on the corner, but he keeps winking at you.
A skateboarder wipes out right in front of your store. He gets up, dusts off, and rides away.
A street magician is showing off some cool tricks, but he keeps eyeing your merchandise.
A kid dressed as Spider-Man is swinging a toy web and making sound effects.
A car drives by blasting the latest pop hit. Everyone on the street is bopping to the beat.
A jogger stops to tie their shoe, glancing at your shop with curiosity.
A mailman is having a heated conversation with a stray cat.
A food truck parks nearby, and the smell of tacos fills the air.
A group of breakdancers is putting on an impromptu show.
A delivery drone hovers overhead, searching for its destination.
A person in a Pikachu costume is handing out flyers for a new comic book store.
A street artist is painting a mural, and it’s starting to attract a crowd.
A woman on a hoverboard zooms by, narrowly avoiding a collision with a cyclist.
A busker is playing the saxophone, filling the street with smooth jazz.
A man dressed as Gandalf is loudly proclaiming, 'You shall not pass!' to random passersby.
A couple of hipsters are arguing over which coffee shop is the best.
A kid is chasing a runaway balloon down the street.
A person with VR goggles is walking around, completely oblivious to their surroundings.
A drone race is happening overhead, with spectators cheering on their favorite pilot.
A group of teenagers is filming a TikTok dance in front of your shop.
A woman in a Wonder Woman costume is posing for photos with kids.
A street vendor is selling knock-off sunglasses and watches.
A guy dressed as Deadpool is juggling swords and cracking jokes.
A flash mob breaks out in a choreographed dance routine.
A street preacher is loudly warning about the end of the world.
A person in a banana costume is handing out samples of a new energy drink.
A skateboarder is practicing tricks on the curb.
A man with a metal detector is scanning the sidewalk, hoping to find treasure.
A group of friends is debating the best superhero movies of all time.
A mime is pretending to be stuck in an invisible box.
A food delivery guy on a bicycle speeds by, nearly hitting a pedestrian.
A guy with a pet iguana on his shoulder is browsing the market.
A clown on stilts is making balloon animals for kids.
A person dressed as a medieval knight is challenging people to mock duels.
A woman with a parrot on her shoulder is strolling by, talking to her feathered friend.
A group of LARPers is having a sword fight in the park nearby.
A person in a stormtrooper costume is posing for pictures.
A magician is performing card tricks, drawing a small crowd.
A man dressed as Elvis is singing and shaking his hips.
A person in a full-body dinosaur costume is trying to navigate the crowded street.
A unicyclist is juggling flaming torches, impressing the onlookers.
A person dressed as a zombie is slowly shuffling along, scaring a few kids.
A group of college students is debating the best strategy for their next D&D campaign.
